biotools.summary: rPanglaoDB is an R package to download and merge labeled single-cell RNA-seq data from the PanglaoDB database. A meta-analysis database for single cell RNA sequencing data. Search across datasets, studies, download data, and perform advanced visualization. PanglaoDB is a database for the scientific community interested in exploration of single cell RNA sequencing experiments from mouse and human. We collect and integrate data from multiple studies and present them through a unified framework.
